channel.title: Post your Black Ops videos here!
channel.description:
Well since you can upload clips from Black Ops straight to YouTube and a good portion of the community has it, why not make a thread for videos? :P
Here's one, quite lulzy to watch. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SHe1nipUxVg

item.title: Post your Black Ops videos here!
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

My latest vid. If anyone wants any clips captured I’d be willing to help out. I have a HD PVR.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:18, topic:368595”][quote author=ollie123 link=topic=464742.msg3402740#msg3402740 date=1290092128]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BM84qG2CHaY

Here is my 63-2 Domination on Crisis.
[/quote]

What did you use to record?[/quote]

I used a Hauppauge HD PVR, played back in Theater mode.

item.title: Post your Black Ops videos here!
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:3, topic:368595”][quote author=Exion link=topic=464742.msg3398418#msg3398418 date=1289687112]
Haha nice video. Unfortunately, I can’t upload videos because I can’t verify my account.
[/quote]

I had that problem, I had to guess my password for like 4 hours. I made the email account almost 3 years ago and I obviously changed passwords since then.[/quote]
Same thing is happening to me! I keep getting locked out of MSN because I can’t remember my password.

Read full topic
